name: Planetary Anarchy
description:
This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Information.

  • You are the Jon'el, Jon'el is in charge of the planetary cannons defense system this weekend. 
  • Jon'el will get fired if the new planetary defense system is completely destroyed. 
  • Jon'el gets tilted very easily.

Ohhh poor Jon'el, the planetary defense system camera has gone haywire this weekend and its rotating out of control making his works way harder than it should.

Will he be able to mantain his job by defending the planet defense matrix and cof cof preventing planetary destruction cof cof.

Controls

  • Mouse movement and clicks
  • Enter key: Pause meteorite wave.
  • Escape key: Go back to main menu
